name: ListSim
description: Retrieve a list of Super SIMs from your account.

Status.description: The status of the Sim resources to read. Can be `new`, `ready`, `active`, `inactive`, or `scheduled`.

Fleet.description: The SID or unique name of the Fleet to which a list of Sims are assigned.

Iccid.description: The [ICCID](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Subscriber_identity_module#ICCID) associated with a Super SIM to filter the list by. Passing this parameter will always return a list containing zero or one SIMs.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
